meanings.definition: The days of the week, typically Monday to Friday, on which people work.
meanings.sent1: During the workdays, employees are busy at their jobs.
meanings.sent2: Most businesses operate on workdays for regular operations.
meanings.sent3: On workdays, the office is bustling with activity.
meanings.sent4: The workdays are like a well-oiled machine, keeping everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: Children know that workdays mean their parents are at work.

meanings.definition: The days on which work is done, excluding weekends and holidays.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys the peacefulness of workdays without the weekend rush.
meanings.sent2: Workdays are when productivity is at its peak in the office.
meanings.sent3: His cat seems to nap more on workdays, missing the attention.
meanings.sent4: The workdays are like a steady rhythm in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The workdays pass by quickly when you're focused on tasks.
